<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/celestial-alignment.png} tip={Celestial Alignment}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-force.png} tip={Astral Force}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-energy.png} tip={Astral Energy}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight-enhancement-i.png} tip={Starlight Enhancement I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/oort-wave.png} tip={Oort Wave}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ii-algol.png} tip={Stellar II - Algol}>

<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starry-boost.png} tip={Starry Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-elements.png} tip={Astral Elements}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-invincibility.png} tip={Astral Invincibility}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-enhancement-i.png} tip={Stellar Enhancement I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight-enhancement-ii.png} tip={Starlight Enhancement II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iv-bellatrix.png} tip={Stellar IV - Bellatrix}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-v-fomalhaut.png} tip={Stellar V - Fomalhaut}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iii-alchiba.png} tip={Stellar III - Alchiba}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole}>

<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-assimilation.png } tip={Astral Assimilation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-infinity.png} tip={Astral Infinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-enhancement-ii.png} tip={Stellar Enhancement II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight-enhancement-iii.png} tip={Starlight Enhancement III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-vi-izar.png} tip={Stellar VI - Izar}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-vii-vega.png} tip={Stellar VII - Vega}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/link.png} tip={Link}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-viii-sadalmelik.png} tip={Stellar VIII - Sadalmelik}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/appear.png} tip={Appear}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pulse.png} tip={Pulsing}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Sia Astelle Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Stellagram Fusion
content: Sia's skills can be catagorized as "Marking Skills" and "Constellation Skills". Upon using a "Marking Skill", it is recorded onto <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill)}> the Stellagram gauge. When a matching combination (in any order) is recorded onto the gauge, a [Stellagram Fusion] is triggered and a matching "Constellation Skill" is activated
"Constellation Skills" can also be assigned a Key Slot and used without a [Stellagram Fusion]. However, "Constellation Skills" activated using [Stellagram Fusion] gain a bonus effect
In 5th Job, using <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/shine.png} tip={Shine (5th Job)}> grants a buff where the bonus effect is always granted even without [Stellagram Fusion]

The <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill)}> Stellagram gauge can be reset by pressing the Down Arrow Key and <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> together. As well, each "Constellation Skill" can be locked by right-clicking the skill to prevent it from activating from [Stellagram Fusion]

primary.name: Return to Oort
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 600 sec.
primary.desc: When used, teleports to Oort, Sia's hometown
details: This skill is gained by completing the Sia storyline

primary.name: Starry Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20
primary.desc: While in the air, hold the Skill Key or the Jump Key to slowly glide
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the Jump Key activation

primary.name: Stellar Marking
primary.shortDesc: When cast, Marking Skills will be recorded on the Stellagram. Once four skills are recorded on the Stellagram, the Constellation Skill that corresponds to the recorded combination will be triggered
details: The order of the Marking Skills recorded does not matter

primary.name: Stellar Equalize
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec, Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec.
details: Affects all nearby players
This skill is gained by completing the Sia storyline

primary.name: Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 4, Records Ray on the Stellagram
primary.desc: Fires a lance of starlight forward
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram
Pressing the Skill Key and Down Arrow Key together will reset the Stellagram record

primary.name: Stellar I - Antares
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Summons a rabbit hole that periodically deals 160% collision damage 3 times to up to 6 enemies for 6 sec., Max Summons: 4\nRabbit holes recharge every 10 sec., and you can have up to 4\n[Stellargram Fusion] Rabbit Hole Duration: +8 sec.
primary.desc: Summon a rabbit hole that periodically pulls in and damages enemies within
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}><bp_Grants increased summon duration_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF preventing the skill from activating with <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill}>_>
Up to 4 rabbit holes can be active at a time
Skill can hold up to 4 rabbit holes and recharges every 10 sec
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Starlight
primary.shortDesc: Upon attacking or activating a Constellation Skill, deals 90% damage 2 times and releases a travelling ray of starlight up to 3 times\nThe ray of starlight attacks until it disappears or reaches the max number of attacks. When the starlight disappears, it attacks an enemy that was previously attacked an additional 1 times
primary.desc: While toggled, using the Attack Key or Constellation Skill releases a damaging ray that bounces to nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Starry Flow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Horizontal Range: 190, Teleport Vertical Range: 295
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Starry Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air

primary.name: Astral Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -20%, 85% of damage taken goes to MP instead, Defense: +100, MP: +120 per level
primary.desc: Reduces damage taken and a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: Additionally increases DEF
Excludes attacks that deal %Max HP damage
Will not work if you have 0 MP

primary.name: Astral Movement
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Speed: +22, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20

primary.name: Boom
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 3, Records Boom on the Stellagram
primary.desc: Explodes starlight in the surrounding area
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram

primary.name: Stellar II - Algol
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Summons Algol as a lizard that deals 210% damage to up to 8 enemies 4 times for 12 sec.\n[Stellagram Fusion] Lizard Duration: +18 sec\nCooldown: 20 sec.
primary.desc: Summons a lizard that periodically charges towards nearby enemies
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}><bp_Grants increased summon duration_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF preventing the skill from activating with <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill}>_>
Targets bosses with the highest Max HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Celestial Alignment
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 80 sec., Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Oort Wave
primary.shortDesc: INT: +20, Damage: +15%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Starlight Enhancement I
primary.shortDesc: Starlight Damage: +100% points
details: Increases %Damage of attack by a flat amount
Also applies to attack triggered by <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iv-bellatrix.png} tip={Stellar IV - Bellatrix (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Astral Force
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +50%, Magic ATT: +30, INT: +20, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Astral Energy
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +30%\nMP Absorb Chance: 30%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP, Amount Absorbed: 3% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Increases %Max MP and your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Pole
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Summons starlight that deals 520% damage to up to 5 enemies 3 times for 3 sec., Records Pole on the Stellagram\nCooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Place down a starlight that damages within it
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram

primary.name: Stellar III - Alchiba
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Duration: 30 sec., Ignore Defense: +30%\n[Stellagram Fusion] Magic ATT: +30\nCooldown: 60 sec.
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}><bp_Grants Magic ATT_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF preventing the skill from activating with <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill}>_>

primary.name: Stellar IV - Bellatrix
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Duration: 30 sec., Damage: +10%, Activates Starlight Link at set intervals\n[Stellagram Fusion] Number of Starlight Link attacks: +1\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Increases %Damage and periodically activates <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}>
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}><bp_Grants an extra hit with triggered <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}>_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF preventing the skill from activating with <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill}>_>

primary.name: Stellar V - Fomalhaut
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 90, Duration: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 410%, Number of Attacks: 4, Horned Conches Created: 4
[Stellagram Fusion] Upon attacking, summons 4 Horned Conches that automatically pursue and attack nearby enemies.
Conches deal 410% damage 2 times until the max number of attacks is reached or they disappear
Attacks up to 2 times, then disappears in 10 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Summon horned conches that spin around you and damages nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Stellar XI - Sirius
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600, Summons Sirius as a wolf that deals 870% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times for 12 sec.
The wolf will howl before he disappears increasing Ignore Defense 10% for 10 sec.
[Stellagram Fusion] Grants the Howl buff while the wolf is active
Cooldown: 60 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons a stationary wolf that attacks nearby enemies and grants a buff when it disappears
details: [Buff]: Increases %Ignore DEF

[Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/shine.png} tip={Shine (5th Job)}><bp_Additionally grants buff while wolf is summoned_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF preventing the skill from activating with <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill}>_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

The hourglass can be enhanced by attacking the enemy with a constellation skill, increasing Final Damage by 100%
[Stellagram Fusion] Explosion Count: +4
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons an hourglass that deals damage after a short period or when the Skill Key is pressed again
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/shine.png} tip={Shine (5th Job)}><bp_Grants increased number of explosions_Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock ON/OFF preventing the skill from activating with <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking.png} tip={Stellar Marking (Beginner Skill}>_>

masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, Summons a rabbit hole that periodically deals 550% collision damage 4 times to up to 6 enemies for 6 sec., Max Summons: 4\nRabbit holes recharge every 10 sec., and you can have up to 4\n[Stellagram Fusion] Rabbit Hole Duration: +8 sec.

originSkill.name: Celestial Design
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 840%, Number of Attacks: 8, Starlight Explosion: 50
Afterwards, Damage: 1340%, Number of Attacks: 12, Starlight Explosion: 40
Cooldown: 360 sec.

meta: Sia is an INT mage class part of the Shine. Sia utilize Celestial Light as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Sia can equip Compasses
